body: When using mythic limited wish to duplicate another spell, you can duplicate a mythic spell you know (if you're a spontaneous caster) or have prepared (if you're a caster who prepares spells). If you don't know or haven't prepared the mythic spell, you can expend a second use of mythic power duplicate the mythic version of the desired spell.
name: Limited Wish, Mythic

sections.body: If you expend two uses of mythic power, you can cast a silent, stilled mythic limited wish, even if you're helpless or couldn't otherwise take actions (but not unconscious).
sections.name: Augmented
